code: import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function FormattedDate(props){var days=["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"];var day=days[props.date.getDay()];var hours=props.date.getHours();if(hours<10){hours="0".concat(hours);}var minutes=props.date.getMinutes();if(minutes<10){minutes="0".concat(minutes);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[day," ",hours,":",minutes]});}
